about_the_game:
Note: ChatTDT is not in anyway related or affiliated to "Twitch", the use of Twitch is just for the purpose of clarity.
(Requires a Twitch Account and an active stream to play!)

Dive into the dynamic world of "ChatTDT: Tower Defense Twitch" where your Twitch chat becomes an integral part of the action! Designed to seamlessly integrate with the Twitch API, ChatTDT offers a unique and interactive tower defense experience that engages both streamers and viewers like never before.


Features:

  • Level Up: Progress through challenging levels and enhance your strategies as you go.
  • Prestige: Reset your progress for powerful bonuses and climb the ranks even faster.
  • Viewers Vote Map: Let your audience have a say in the game! Viewers can vote on the next map, adding an extra layer of excitement.
  • Rage Powerbar: Build up rage to unleash devastating powers against your foes.
  • Drops and Inventory: Collect valuable drops and manage your inventory to gain the upper hand.
  • Boss Mobs: Face off against formidable bosses that will test your strategic prowess.
  • Channel Point Rewards Linked: Integrate Twitch channel point rewards directly into the game, making viewer interaction more rewarding.
  • Persistent Saving and Levels for Users: Enjoy a consistent experience with persistent saving, ensuring your progress and user levels are always preserved.
  • Highscore Leaderboards: Compete for glory! Viewers can fight for the top spots on the leaderboards, adding a competitive edge to the game.
  • Discord Webhook Integration: Stay connected with your community through Discord. Game updates and achievements can be shared directly to your server.
  • Stay ahead of the curve with constant updates. If the Twitch API changes, I will strive to update the game as soon as possible to ensure seamless gameplay.


Join the ChatTDT community today and transform your Twitch channel into an epic battleground!
